de.tuberlin.dima.bdapro.dataIntegration.sensor.workflows

Class SensorFiltering

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.tuberlin.dima.bdapro.dataIntegration.sensor.workflows.UnifiedSensorWorkflow
      • de.tuberlin.dima.bdapro.dataIntegration.sensor.workflows.SensorFiltering

  • public class SensorFiltering
extends UnifiedSensorWorkflow
    Flink workflow that filters the sensor data to only include data of sensors whose closest weather station is contained in the downloaded weather data.

    This workflow contains methods to calculate the filtered dataset from scratch and return it directly, as well as to precalculate the filtered data and store it to file, from where it can then be loaded again.

      • getFilteredSensors

        public static org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<UnifiedSensorReading> getFilteredSensors(boolean cached,
                                                                                         java.lang.String dataDirectory,
                                                                                         org.apache.flink.api.java.ExecutionEnvironment env)
        Returns a filtered dataset of all sensor readings found in the specified data directory. If cached, it loads precalculated data from file, otherwise it loads the raw data and filters it.
        Parameters:
        cached - Whether to load precalculated data from file or load raw data and filter it.
        dataDirectory - The base path of the data directory.
        env - An execution environment to use.
        Returns:
        the dataset of filtered sensor.

      • getFilteredSensor

        public static org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<UnifiedSensorReading> getFilteredSensor(Type sensorType,
                                                                                        boolean cached,
                                                                                        java.lang.String dataDirectory,
                                                                                        org.apache.flink.api.java.ExecutionEnvironment env)
        Returns a filtered dataset of sensor readings of a given type found in the specified data directory. If cached, it loads precalculated data from file, otherwise it loads the raw data and filters it.
        Parameters:
        sensorType - The type of sensor to filter
        cached - Whether to load precalculated data from file or load raw data and filter it.
        dataDirectory - The base path of the data directory.
        env - An execution environment to use.
        Returns:
        the dataset of filtered sensor.

      • filterSensor

        private static org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<UnifiedSensorReading> filterSensor(Type sensorType,
                                                                                    java.lang.String dataDirectory,

                                                                                    org.apache.flink.api.java.ExecutionEnvironment env)
        Loads all sensor data of a given type and filters it such that the result only includes readings from the specified accepted sensor locations.
        Parameters:
        sensorType - The type of the sensor data to load from disk
        dataDirectory - The base path of the data directory.
        acceptedSensors - The given sensor locations to include in the result.
        env - An execution environment to use.
        Returns:
        the dataset of sensor of filtered sensor readings
